biometrics_tracker.model.uoms module¶

  • Index
class biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.BG(value)¶

Bases: UOM

This Enum contains u.o.m.’s used to measure blood glucose levels

class biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.Pressure(value)¶

Bases: UOM

This Enum contains u.o.m’s used to measure blood pressure

class biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.Rate(value)¶

Bases: UOM

This Enum contains u.o.m.’s used to measure periodic phenomena such as pulse and respiration

class biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.Temperature(value)¶

Bases: UOM

This Enum contains u.o.m.’s used to measure temperature

class biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.UOM(value)¶

Bases: Enum

This is a base class for Enums the enumerate a particular class of unit of measure

abstract abbreviation() → str¶

This method provides an abbreviation for a particular u.o.m, e.g. lbs for pounds

Returns:

Unit of measure abbreviation

Return type:

str

class biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.Weight(value)¶

Bases: UOM

This Enum contains u.o.m.’s used to measure weight

biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.cls¶

alias of Rate

biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.uom_class_names = ['Weight', 'Pressure', 'Temperature', 'BG', 'Rate']¶

A list contains the names of classes used to record biometric data

Property uom_class_names:

biometrics_tracker.model.uoms.uom_classes = [<enum 'Weight'>, <enum 'Pressure'>, <enum 'Temperature'>, <enum 'BG'>, <enum 'Rate'>]¶
